Five NE213 neutron detectors located behind a
massive collimator shielding in a distance of
1200 cm from the sample. The angle separation between
the detectors is 12.5 deg. Detector diameter 10.16 cm
The angle region covered is 12.5 deg to 160 deg.
An additional NE213 detector was used as relative
fluence monitor, diameter 3.81 cm, length 3.81 cm.
